MariMod:Mari_Glow.NAME: Glow
MariMod:Mari_Glow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !MARI_RADIANCE! Radiance to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Shine.NAME: Shine
MariMod:Mari_Shine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! Radiance to ANY character. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Sparkle.NAME: Sparkle
MariMod:Mari_Sparkle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !MARI_RADIANCE! Radiance. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_SHINY.DESCRIPTION: Double ANY NL character's Radiance. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Defend.NAME: Defend
MariMod:Mari_Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Kindle: Gain !B! more.

MariMod:Mari_Its_Joke.NAME: "It's Joke!"
MariMod:Mari_Its_Joke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then heal the enemy for each unblock damage dealt (up to !M!).

MariMod:Mari_The_FLYING_CAR.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL deal !D! damage and apply !MARI_RADIANCE! Radiance.

MariMod:Mari_The_MANSION.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL remove ALL your debuffs and gain !B! Block.

MariMod:Mari_Choreography.NAME: Choreography
MariMod:Mari_Choreography.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend less energy on a card than the previous on the same turn, NL draw !M! card.
MariMod:Mari_Choreography.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend less energy on a card than the previous on the same turn, NL draw !M! cards.

MariMod:Mari_Mic_Check.NAME: Mic Check
MariMod:Mari_Mic_Check.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put ALL cards with quotation marks in their names from your draw pile into your hand.

MariMod:Mari_Reminisce.NAME: Reminisce
MariMod:Mari_Reminisce.DESCRIPTION: Choose from !M! types of cards in your exhaust pile to randomly move one to your hand. You cannot choose that type again.

MariMod:Mari_Expensive_Tastes.NAME: Expensive Tastes
MariMod:Mari_Expensive_Tastes.DESCRIPTION: Rearrange your draw pile by cost. NL (Expensive on top) NL Kindle: The top card costs 0 until played.

MariMod:Mari_Devilish_Assistant.NAME: Devilish Assistant
MariMod:Mari_Devilish_Assistant.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, play the last card you played on the same target for free. NL (Does not self-trigger)

MariMod:Mari_Character_Development.NAME: Character Development
MariMod:Mari_Character_Development.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you fully lose a debuff, NL gain 2 Strength.

MariMod:Mari_Shining_Tornado.NAME: Shining Tornado
MariMod:Mari_Shining_Tornado.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !MARI_RADIANCE! Radiance to a random enemy !M! times. Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Tough_Front.NAME: Tough Front
MariMod:Mari_Tough_Front.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain 1 Frail. NL Kindle: Lose 2 Frail.

MariMod:Mari_Cash_Back.NAME: Cash Back
MariMod:Mari_Cash_Back.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you [#fbccff]spend[] Gold, regain !M! NL percent of it. NL (Max 80 percent)
MariMod:Mari_Cash_Back.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you [#fbccff]spend[] Gold, regain !M! NL percent of it. NL (Max 80 percent)

MariMod:Mari_Delicacy.NAME: Delicacy
MariMod:Mari_Delicacy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you [#fbccff]spend[] Gold, draw a card.

MariMod:Mari_Debut.NAME: Debut
MariMod:Mari_Debut.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to apply !MARI_RADIANCE! Radiance and gain !MARI_RADIANCE! Radiance. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Golden_Glint.NAME: Golden Glint
MariMod:Mari_Golden_Glint.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL gain !MARI_RADIANCE! Radiance and !B! Block.

MariMod:Mari_The_Beach_Episode.NAME: The Beach Episode
MariMod:Mari_The_Beach_Episode.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block and Frail from ANY character. NL Gain !MARI_RADIANCE! Radiance for every 5 Block or 1 Frail removed.
MariMod:Mari_The_Beach_Episode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block and Frail from ALL characters. NL Gain !MARI_RADIANCE! Radiance for every 5 Block or 1 Frail removed.

MariMod:Mari_Flaunt.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you [#fbccff]spend[] Gold, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

MariMod:Mari_Expenses.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deals !B! more for each time you spent Gold this combat.
MariMod:Mari_Expenses.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deals !B! more for each time you spent Gold this combat.

MariMod:Mari_The_Planisphere.NAME: The Planisphere
MariMod:Mari_The_Planisphere.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. Deal damage and apply Radiance equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Overexertion.NAME: Overexertion
MariMod:Mari_Overexertion.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and reduce their costs by 1 this combat NL (down to 1). NL Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL Gain 1 Frail.

MariMod:Mari_Heavy_Price.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL twice the total cost of all other cards in your hand.
MariMod:Mari_Heavy_Price.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 3 + twice the total cost of all other cards in your hand.

MariMod:Mari_Tea_Time.NAME: Tea Time
MariMod:Mari_Tea_Time.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to reduce ALL debuff stacks by !M!.

MariMod:Mari_$Memories_Of_Loss.DESCRIPTION: Return a card with Exhaust from your Exhaust pile to your hand.

MariMod:Mari_$Memories_Of_Luxury.DESCRIPTION: Return a card that [#fbccff]Spends[] Gold from your Exhaust pile to your hand.

MariMod:Mari_$Memories_Of_Performance.DESCRIPTION: Return a card with quotation marks in its name from your Exhaust pile to your hand.

MariMod:Mari_Lets_Go.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL This always costs 1 more for each other skill in your hand.

MariMod:Mari_Defiance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you are Frail, lose 1 Frail and gain !B! Block.

MariMod:Mari_Pretty_Bomber_Head.NAME: "Pretty Bomber Head!"

MariMod:Mari_The_HELICOPTER.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

MariMod:Mari_No_Problem.NAME: "No Problem!"

MariMod:Mari_Boundless_Energy.NAME: Boundless Energy
MariMod:Mari_Boundless_Energy.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL gain !M! [E]. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Supervision.NAME: Supervision

MariMod:Mari_From_Zero.NAME: From Zero...

MariMod:Mari_Administrator_Privilege.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold. NL Instead of drawing regularly, you choose cards from your draw pile to put into your hand at the start of your turn.
MariMod:Mari_Administrator_Privilege.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold. NL Instead of drawing regularly, you choose cards from your draw pile to put into your hand at the start of your turn.

MariMod:Mari_All_Or_Nothing.NAME: "All or Nothing!"

MariMod:Mari_Higher_Ups.DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY Mari card to add to your hand. Reduce its cost to 0 this turn and [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold for each [E] reduced. NL Exhaust.
MariMod:Mari_Higher_Ups.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY Upgraded Mari card to add to your hand. Reduce its cost to 0 this turn and [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold for each [E] reduced. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Wishing_Fountain.NAME: Wishing Fountain
MariMod:Mari_Wishing_Fountain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL Lose any unspent Gold from this card at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Flawless_Form.NAME: Flawless Form

MariMod:Mari_Stewshine.DESCRIPTION: Play three combined cards. NL (Special Relic Card.)

MariMod:Mari_Grand_Scheme.DESCRIPTION: [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold X times. At the start of your next turn, gain !M! Gold and [E] X times. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Hug.NAME: Hug

MariMod:Mari_Oh_My_God.NAME: "Oh My God!"
MariMod:Mari_Oh_My_God.DESCRIPTION: If any enemy intends to attack, play copies of up to !M! random cards in your hand on a target for free. NL (Except "Oh My God!")

MariMod:Mari_Old_Costume.NAME: Old Costume
MariMod:Mari_Old_Costume.DESCRIPTION: Target ANY character. It gains !M! Block and 1 Vulnerable.

MariMod:Mari_Lie_In_Wait.NAME: Lie In Wait

MariMod:Mari_Emotional_Episode.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold. NL Draw a card. NL Gain !M! Gold if you start your next turn with a debuff. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Unveiled_Secret.NAME: Unveiled Secret
MariMod:Mari_Unveiled_Secret.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold. NL Draw a card. NL Gain !M! Gold if you start your next turn with no Block. NL Exhaust.

MariMod:Mari_Idolize.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL [#fbccff]Spend[] !MARI_GOLD_COST! Gold to NL upgrade ALL cards in your draw pile with two or more copies. NL Exhaust.
